function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Restriction of public places and businesses","Impact":"Economic impact, social impact, mental health impact","Mitigation":"Support for affected businesses, mental health support for individuals","Technologies":"Contactless delivery, online mental health services","People":"Business owners, employees, elderly individuals, individuals with chronic illnesses","Owner":"Government, business owners, healthcare providers"},{"Description":"Restriction of movement for elderly and high-risk individuals","Impact":"Social isolation, mental health impact, lack of access to essentials","Mitigation":"Community support, delivery services, telehealth services","Technologies":"Online community platforms, delivery apps, telemedicine platforms","People":"Elderly individuals, individuals with chronic illnesses","Owner":"Government, community organizations, healthcare providers"},{"Description":"Imposition of curfew and fines for non-compliance","Impact":"Civil liberties, economic impact, mental health impact","Mitigation":"Clear communication, support for those affected by fines","Technologies":"Public communication channels, online support services","People":"General public, individuals at high risk, law enforcement","Owner":"Government"}]}
